name: (Prototype) Invader Fortified
description:
NOTE:  This game is still in prototype phase.

Make Sure to play it on fullscreen!

How to Play;

  1.  Current Prototype will end at wave 5.
  2. Press any tower at bottom bar to choose your tower.
  3. Press any grey area to put your tower.
  4. Special tower A.K.A  (bank) can only be placed in special spot (golden).
  5. Make sure that you have enough money to spend for the tower.
  6. Bank will help boost your money income.
  7. To Upgrade or edit a tower, First you need to press selected tower. Then press red X button to cancel edit or press Grey X button to remove selected tower. A tower can only be upgraded 3 times for it's range and damage.
  8. A tower's HP can also be upgraded and restored using edit tower mode.
  9. Press start Wave to start the wave.
  10. Have fun and good luck !

Game Made by:

  • Kevin Leonardrich - 2440041535 - Lead Game design and Game Programmer
  • Nathanael Myrick - 2440081116 - Game design
  • Ignatius Kevin - 2440047652 - Sprite Artist
  • Timothy Kenji - 2440052690 - Sprite Artist
